Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So6SecKeyC3RSA.name: pem
Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So6SecKeyC3RSA.abstract: The key in PEM format. Public key’s PEM will also contain header data required for OpenSSL and other applications, but not in the internal iOS representation of the key.

Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So6SecKeyC3RSA.name: make(fromPEM:isPublicKey:)
Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So6SecKeyC3RSA.abstract: Creates SecKey from PEM text. The method also trims header data (generated by OpenSSL and others) from PEM if needed.

Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC15generateKey.name: generateKeyPair(withSize:)
Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC15generateKey.abstract: Generates RSA keys with specified key size.

Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC4sign10Founda.name: sign(_:using:digestAlgorithm:)
Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC4sign10Founda.abstract: Signs a data (digest) using private key and returns a digital signature. The data will be hashed using specified digest algorithm and then signed with private key.

Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC6verifySb10Fo.name: verify(_:using:digestAlgorithm:signature:)
Classes/RSA.html#/s:3RSAAAC6verifySb10Fo.abstract: Verifies a data (digest) using public key and digital signature. The data will be hashed using specified digest algorithm, and then digest will be verified with public key and signature.

Classes/RSA.html.name: RSA
Classes/RSA.html.abstract: The RSA class provides a set of tools for working with RSA cryptographic algorithm.
